programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: TC asks Magnum to take on a case to help acquit the father of one of TC's young football players who is accused of murder.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: An aging tycoon asks Magnum to find his lost love, who he says just recently contacted him -- but she died 30 years earlier; Rick and TC meet a fellow vet who is having a hard time adjusting to civilian life.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: When Magnum takes the case of a little girl's missing cat, he stumbles upon another cat's murdered owner.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: A dying man hires Magnum to find his estranged bone marrow-compatible brother; Magnum's case brings back memories of a past SEAL team mission that went sideways.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.desc: After a 16-year-old kidnap victim escapes her captors, her parents hire Magnum, who experienced similar trauma as a POW, to find who took her.

programme.title: Magnum P.I.
programme.sub-title: Bad Day to Be a Hero
programme.desc: Magnum must help Rick's crush after her illegal poker game is robbed by masked gunmen and she is on the hook with the mob for the stolen money.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: At the meeting of the ornithological society, Ralph Ford claims that he had spotted the blue-fronted hoopoe, but no one believes him, including the chairman, Patrick Morgan; the next morning, Patrick is found dead, leading the team to investigate.

programme.title: Midsomer Murders
programme.desc: Barnaby and Jones investigate when the appearance of a headless horseman foreshadows a number of deaths.

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: During her recovery from an injury, Angie hears someone threatened from her hospital room while under the influence of a drug; no one believes her.

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: At Angie's high school reunion, she drags Shade along so she doesn't have to confront her ex-BFF, Jada Berry, alone; after a body ends up on the dance floor, it's up to the PE crew to solve the mysterious murder.

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: When local radio therapist, Dr. Rohan Love (Huse Madhavji), starts acting strangely and spending huge sums of money, his wife Meera hires Shade and Angie to find out what secret he's hiding.

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: Shade's precious Porsche is stolen at a luxury car show and he suspects his old hockey rival Mark "Lytnin'" Lyte (Dion Johnstone) might be to blame; Meanwhile, Angie struggles with PTSD.

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: When a young writer close to fame and fortune is threatened and then a famous guest drops dead, Shade, Angie and Tex find themselves following a trail of clues that lead them into a world of jealousy, desperation and greed.

programme.title: Private Eyes
programme.desc: While visiting Nora and her serious boo, Rory, Shade and Angie learn that a pair of Billy the Kid's cowboy boots have gone missing from the local museum; when Rory gets fingered as the prime suspect, Angie and Shade race to find Billy's secret.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: Charlie and Rex investigate a hot case under cold conditions when a figure skating coach is found dead.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: After a murder at the shipping container port, Charlie and Rex partner with a Border Security officer to track down the mastermind behind a smuggling ring.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: Charlie and Rex pull apart the secrets of a local band when their lead singer is found dead on the beach.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: The clock is ticking as Charlie and Rex attempt to find a murderer before the victim can succumb to the poison slowly killing them.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: Charlie and Rex are on the case after a social media star dies while livestreaming her wedding.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: As Charlie and Rex head into the woods to track a missing photographer, a mysterious organization throws the investigation off its trail.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: Charlie and Rex investigate a fantasy role-playing game turned deadly when a player is found slain by a sword.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: Charlie and Rex are in deep water after a university rower is shot by a sniper during team practice.

programme.title: Hudson & Rex
programme.desc: Cultures clash when the death of a Parisian journalist has Charlie and Rex partnering with a French detective in an investigation that whisks the team to Saint Pierre and Miquelon.
